trans-unit.source: Defines methods a class implements to act as an implicit resource provider.
Resources can be declared explicitly or implicitly within a page.
Implicit resources allow the developer to assign a collection of resource values to a control in one statement rather than assigning each value individually.

When the page parser encounters an implicit resource in the form of `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`, it assigns all the values with the `WelcomeLabel` resource key prefix to the corresponding values in the control.
For example, if a resource file defines values for `WelcomeLabel.Text` and `WelcomeLabel.ToolTip`, those values would be assigned to a `Label` control with an implicit reference to `WelcomeLabel`.
The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider> interface defines the methods a resource provider implements to access implicit resources.
You can obtain a particular value using the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IImplicitResourceProvider.GetObject%2A> method.
If you create a custom resource provider, you do not need to provide customized support for implicit resource localization.
Implicit localization will work with your resource provider.
Gets a collection of implicit resource keys as specified by the prefix.
When implemented, the method returns a collection of implicit resource keys for a particular prefix.
For example, `WelcomeLabel` is specified as the prefix in the expression `meta:resourcekey="WelcomeLabel"`.
Any properties in a local resource file with `WelcomeLabel` as a prefix should be returned with this method.
The prefix of the implicit resource keys to be collected.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of implicit resource keys.
Gets an object representing the value of the specified resource key.
When implemented, the method returns the object for the value represented by the implicit resource key.
The resource key containing the prefix, filter, and property.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that represents the culture for which the resource is localized.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the localized value of an implicit resource key.
